title: All Ball - Pt 2: Andrew Bogut Discusses Bucks Passing on Steph, Warriors First Title Run, Game 7 Loss to Cleveland, Draymond
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt 2: Andrew Bogut Discusses Bucks Passing on Steph, Warriors First Title Run, Game 7 Loss to Cleveland, Draymond
description:
In this episode, Doug sits down for the final installment of his conversation with NBA champion and former #1 overall pick Andrew Bogut. They dive into the infamous trade that never was with the Bucks passing on Steph Curry for Monta Ellis, and gives an inside look at the Warriors incredible first title run in 2015, the growth of Draymond, the devastating Game 7 Finals loss to the Cavs after holding a 3-1 lead in 2016, and if there's any situation that could convince him to un-retire. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
